title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Copilot agent: Clarified context access limitations and task repository scope.
Added Raycast (Windows/macOS) support for assigning issues to Copilot.
Fixed broken links: Added redirect for code security tutorial, corrected Windows runner image path capitalization.
Updated secret risk assessment CTA links to new paths.
Added secondary rate limits for OAuth token requests (2,000/hour).
summary:

- Added Raycast (Windows/macOS) support for assigning issues to Copilot.
- Fixed broken links: Added redirect for code security tutorial, corrected Windows runner image path capitalization.
- Updated secret risk assessment CTA links to new paths.
- Bumped `qs` dependency to 6.14.2.
- Added secondary rate limits for OAuth token requests (2,000/hour).

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Copilot agent: Clarified context access limitations and task repository scope.
- Added Raycast (Windows/macOS) support for assigning issues to Copilot.
- Fixed broken links: Added redirect for code security tutorial, corrected Windows runner image path capitalization.
- Updated secret risk assessment CTA links to new paths.
- Bumped `qs` dependency to 6.14.2.
- Added secondary rate limits for OAuth token requests (2,000/hour).
